mapper.insert: insert into member(me_id, me_pw, me_name, me_acc, me_phone, me_nick, me_ci_num, me_bk_name) values(#{member.me_id},#{member.me_pw},#{member.me_name},#{member.me_acc},#{member.me_phone},#{member.me_nick},#{member.me_ci_num},#{member.me_bk_name})
mapper.update: update member set me_session_id = #{member.me_session_id}, me_session_limit = #{member.me_session_limit} where me_id = #{member.me_id}
mapper.select: select * from member where me_session_id = #{session_id} and me_session_limit >= now();
